comment:
* A family of typefaces with different styles.
 *
 * @hide
 *
 * @deprecated Use {@link android.graphics.fonts.FontFamily} instead.

variables.name: mNativePtr
variables.comment:
* @hide
     *
     * This cannot be deleted because it's in use by AndroidX.

variables.name: mBuilderPtr
variables.comment: Points native font family builder. Must be zero after freezing this family.

methods.name: public boolean freeze()
methods.comment:
* Finalize the FontFamily creation.
     *
     * @return boolean returns false if some error happens in native code, e.g. broken font file is
     *                 passed, etc.
     *
     * This cannot be deleted because it's in use by AndroidX.

methods.name: public void abortCreation()
methods.comment: * This cannot be deleted because it's in use by AndroidX.

methods.name: public boolean addFont(String path, int ttcIndex, FontVariationAxis[] axes, int weight, int italic)
methods.comment: * This cannot be deleted because it's in use by AndroidX.

methods.name: public boolean addFontFromBuffer(ByteBuffer font, int ttcIndex, FontVariationAxis[] axes, int weight, int italic)
methods.comment: * This cannot be deleted because it's in use by AndroidX.

methods.name: public boolean addFontFromAssetManager(AssetManager mgr, String path, int cookie, boolean isAsset, int ttcIndex, int weight, int isItalic, FontVariationAxis[] axes)
methods.comment:
* @param mgr The AssetManager to use for this context.
     * @param path The path to the font file to load.
     * @param cookie If available, the resource cookie given by Resources.
     * @param isAsset {@code true} if this is from the assets/ folder, {@code false} if from
     *            resources
     * @param weight The weight of the font. If 0 is given, the weight and italic will be resolved
     *            using the OS/2 table in the font.
     * @param isItalic Whether this font is italic. If the weight is set to 0, this will be resolved
     *            using the OS/2 table in the font.
     * @return
     *
     * This cannot be deleted because it's in use by AndroidX.

methods.name: private static native long nInitBuilder(String langs, int variant)
private static native long nCreateFamily(long mBuilderPtr)
private static native boolean nAddFont(long builderPtr, ByteBuffer font, int ttcIndex, int weight, int isItalic)
methods.comment: By passing -1 to italic argument, the italic value is resolved by OS/2 table in the font.

methods.name: private static native boolean nAddFontWeightStyle(long builderPtr, ByteBuffer font, int ttcIndex, int weight, int isItalic)
private static native void nAddAxisValue(long builderPtr, int tag, float value)
methods.comment: The added axis values are only valid for the next nAddFont* method call.

methodNames: public boolean addFont(String path, int ttcIndex, FontVariationAxis[] axes, int weight, int italic)
public boolean addFontFromBuffer(ByteBuffer font, int ttcIndex, FontVariationAxis[] axes, int weight, int italic)
public boolean addFontFromAssetManager(AssetManager mgr, String path, int cookie, boolean isAsset, int ttcIndex, int weight, int isItalic, FontVariationAxis[] axes)
private static native long nInitBuilder(String langs, int variant)
private static native long nCreateFamily(long mBuilderPtr)
private static native boolean nAddFont(long builderPtr, ByteBuffer font, int ttcIndex, int weight, int isItalic)
private static native boolean nAddFontWeightStyle(long builderPtr, ByteBuffer font, int ttcIndex, int weight, int isItalic)
private static native void nAddAxisValue(long builderPtr, int tag, float value)
